# Government Tender Announcement: Financial Audit Generalist for the National Capital Commission (NCC)
## Tender Reference Number: cb-4467-94772873
### Tender Status: Expired

The Office of the Auditor General of Canada (OAG) issued Request for Proposal (RFP) #390 for the Financial Audit Generalist – National Capital Commission (NCC) Services, soliciting proposals from qualified Audit and Related Services Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders.

## Tender Description

The OAG is seeking the professional services of two (2) Auditors to assist the audit team in conducting the financial audit of the NCC in accordance with Generally Accepted Auditing Standards (GAAS) and the OAG's audit and documentation standards. The engagement will involve conducting audit work related to the annual financial audit of the NCC for the period from the contract award date to June 30, 2023.

## Eligibility Requirements

The tender is open to SA Holders who qualified under Stream 1 – Financial Audit under the SA369 series of SAs. Six firms have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Welch LLP
* Raymond Chabot Grant Thornton Consulting Inc.
* PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP
* Deloitte LLP
* KPMG LLP
* BDO Canada LLP

## Contract Requirements

The winning bidder must have a Reliability clearance and the ability to contribute to the audit team's compliance with GAAS and the OAG's audit and documentation standards.

## Procurement Information

* Procurement Category: Service Contract
* Procurement Method: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Tender Closing Date: April 12, 2023, at 14:00 hours

## Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity Name: Office of the Auditor General of Canada
* Contracting Entity Address:
	+ 240 Sparks Street
	+ Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0G6
* Contact Information:
	+ Beth Cooper, (613) 952-0213, [suppliers@oag-bvg.gc.ca](mailto:suppliers@oag-bvg.gc.ca)

Note that a lot of information has been left out as requested. Please make sure to double-check for any irrelevant data left behind.

Have fun reviewing the document! Let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with.   Its been a pleasure!   8)
